The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 18 August is 276,809 (491.8 cases per 100,000 population). In the seven days to 14 August, there were 6,748 new confirmed cases (12.0 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 07 August, there were 5,581 new cases and so the new cases have risen by 21% (1167 extra cases).
